origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_market_value', 'description': 'This function provides the current market value of a vehicle based on its model and year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'vehicleModel', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The model of the vehicle.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year of the vehicle.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'marketValue', 'description': 'The estimated current market value of the vehicle.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_market_value, 它的参数输入如下: 'vehicleModel'是'Toyota Camry', 'year'是'2018'.
